thread.title: Tech Firms Including Apple, Google Fight Immigration Order
thread.title_full: Tech Firms Including Apple, Google Fight Immigration Order - WSJ

author: Greg Bensinger
title: Tech Firms Including Apple, Google Fight Immigration Order

organizations.name: ninth u.s. circuit court of appeals

text:
A group of nearly 100 technology companies including Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google are banding together to fight the Trump administration’s controversial travel ban.

In a joint amicus brief filed in the Ninth U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals on Sunday, the firms challenged President Donald Trump’s executive order which temporarily restricts citizens of seven Muslim-majority countries from entering the U.S. The administration...
